data.text:
@gho__sted @TheOyinbooke This is Nice man.

I'm glad you are improving so fast

Special mentions, @TheOyinbooke @GiftOjeabulu_ @DavidAbu_ @samsonafo and other data enthusiasts.

Comments are highly welcome sirs

A scheduled refresh was done and different time for for refresher of the dataset was set. Thanks to @olafusimichael course on Udemy. 
Here is the link for the embedded report:
https://t.co/UkePGvM5tn

Then published the tables in google sheet to the web, then used the link to connect to Power BI.
Data Transformation was done and was used to clean the data, thanks to @AhmedOyelowo advice during #GPPB2022
